metadata.title: CVE-2023-23599 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When copying a network request from the developer tools panel as a curlcommand the output was not being properly sanitized and could allowarbitrary commands to be hidden within. This vulnerability affects Firefox< 109, Thunderbird < 102.7, and Firefox ESR < 102.7.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
